dcterms:creator: Davide Anguita
Alessandro Ghio
Luca Oneto
Xavier Parra
Jorge Luis Reyes-Ortiz
dcterms:description: The HAR dataset was collected from 30 volunteers in a lab performing six scripted different activities while wearing a smartphone on their wrist. The sensor signals (accelerometer and gyroscope) were sampled in fixed-width sliding windows of 2.56 seconds.
dcterms:title: Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones (HAR) dataset

dcterms:creator: Diane J Cook
Aaron S Crandall
Brian L Thomas
Narayanan C Krishnan
dcterms:description: The HH101 dataset consists of data collected from a single-resident home equipped with passive infrared motion sensors and binary sensors to detect movement of doors and cabinets. Data were collected for two months while the resident performed normal daily routines, annotated with twelve ground-truth activity labels.
dcterms:title: CASAS smart home dataset (HH101)
